config.serverpause.prop.commandPermissio: Permission level required to use the op commands for Multiplayer Server Pause
config.serverpause.prop.disabledCompatib: Disables these mod compatibilities if any errors occur with them turned on. Accepts: valkyrienSkies
config.serverpause.prop.pauseWhenAllPlay: Set to true to pause the server when all players are paused.
config.serverpause.prop.pauseWhenNoPlaye: Set to true to pause the server when no players are connected.
config.serverpause.prop.sendChatMessageW: Set to true to send a chat message to all players when the server pause state changes.
Send Chat Message When Server Pause State Changes
Set to true to send a chat message to all players (and to the server log) when the a player's pause state changes.
Send Chat Message When Player Pause State Changes
